text: Walter William Paul Buck (4 March 1900 – 20 October 1980) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). In October 1918, aged 18 and a half, Buck enlisted to serve in World War I but the war ended before he was mobilised and he never actively served. == Notes == == External links == * *Bill Buck's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1900 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bill Buck (footballer)
